name: Rogue
desc: A scoundrel who uses stealth and trickery to overcome obstacles and enemies
coolFeatures: Hits very hard when they deliver a suprise attack
Can easily pick locks and pockets
Hard to hit and moves fast
Rogue archetypes include: Arcane Trickster, Assassin, Inquisitive, Mastermind, Scout, Swashbuckler, and Thief
prompts: Why did you chose the life of a rogue?
Do you belong to a crime or spy organization?
Are you on the run from the law or from an angry thievesâ€™ guild master?
Is it greed that drives you in your adventures, or some other desire or ideal?
Did you serve as a spy or assassin during the Last War?
